message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm open to discussing further but want to be transparent about my valuation.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value you place on the product, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers up to $8,000. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I appreciate your honesty about your budget, however,  $8,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This offer reflects the product's worth while acknowledging your interest.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am unable to go beyond $8,000 for this purchase. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
